thread.title: Justin, Hailey Bieber defy split rumors: 'Very special marriage'
thread.title_full: Justin, Hailey Bieber defy split rumors: 'Very special marriage'

author: @Web Desk
title: Justin, Hailey Bieber defy split rumors: 'Very special marriage'
text:
January 24, 2025
Despite 'constant' speculations of strain in marriage, Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber are inseparable.
Amidst of the Baby singer and the 28-year-old model's split rumors that have been circulating on the internet for quite a while, a source close to the pair People revealed that the couple is "fine."
"They have a great family life, but also enjoy and encourage each other to pursue their passions," the insider said. "She loves that he's into music again. She loves his creative and artistic side. He [keeps] creating with friends."
Noting that it's "quite sad that there are constant split rumors", the tipster shared that "Anyone who spends a lot of time with them can tell how in love they are."
The insider continued, "And also how super focused they are on their marriage."
"They are both very mature for their age and so in it together. It's [a] very special marriage," the tattler added.
The report came after Hailey was reportedly unfollowed by the Sorry on Instagram.
However, the father of one denied unfollowing his wife sharing on his Instagram stories that â€œSomeone went on my account and unfollowed my wife."
"S*** is getting suss out here," he added.
